I checked the maunual and didn't find the meaning of
'P' in the discovery path (crawl.log). 

In terms of "R", will it affect the link depth of a
crawling job. For example, if I set the depth
(max-link-hops) as 8, but I could find the real depth
might be 9 or 10, or more in the discovery path of a
crawl.log file. Is it due to "Redirection"?

Thanks a lot! 
Yan
